author: Dragon_Master_48
title: Better than you might think, for its size...
review:
The "Creator Canister" sets, while usually very small, still manage to fit into the multiple-build 'approach' present in other sets in the same theme, such as 31001 Mini Skyflyer.

Pros

  • Amazing detail through building styles.
  • Like three sets in one!
  • Amazing rebuildable possibilities.
  • Variety of pieces, something which contributes to the three above pros.

Cons

  • None

The incredible detail in this set is outstanding, and shows how even 62 pieces can be built- and rebuilt, and rebuilt, again and again- into a work of LEGO-art.

author: hackedhead
title: Excellent Mini and Great Parts
review:
Bought this a few weeks ago, very pleased. One of my first sets coming out of my dark ages.

Box/Instructions

Minis that comes in these pop-top plastic canisters are my new favorite. I'm using the canister to cart parts back and forth to work for lunchtime building.

Parts

Angle-sided plates in two sizes and colors. Four SNOT (studs not on top) supporting bricks. Good sampling of translucent stud-bricks for decorating builds. Excellent overall.

Build

I'll just leave this here....
http://youtu.be/994yXUJzGrc

The completed model

Swept wing fighter is highly swooshable, as already noted by others. Fixed wing variant is 9/10. Shuttle/rocket version I did not get to before these pieces were consumed by MOCs.

Summary

Phenomenal set. Fully and highly recommended.

author: RuneLar
title: Nice little set
review:
I have a call center job where I can build Lego sets while working. I found this set to be the perfect level of complexity to build within a ten minute time period. I occupy myself by memorizing the build so I can do it from memory. The main build was by far my favorite. 

I didn't like how may pieces were left over from the other two models, the space shuttle especially. 

I would recommend this model if you are looking for a quick fun build.
